titleStmt.title: The councils of wisdom: or, A collection of the maxims of Solomon. Most necessary for a man wisely to behave himself. : with reflections on those maxims. / Rendred into English by T.D..
Conseils de la sagesse. English. 1683
titleStmt.author: Boutauld, Michel, 1604-1689.
Fouquet, Nicolas, 1615-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Stephen Swart, at the Bible and Crown near the Exchange,,

notesStmt.note: Wrongly attributed to Nicolas Fouquet--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
This item is identified at reel 1477:11 as Wing B2634 (number cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproductions of original in the British Library.
